descriptionHtml:
[size=\"5\"]Dragon Sword[/size]
[size=\"4\"]Models and Textures by Suhoi, Textures and game implementation by KevSer[/size]

[b][color=red]UPDATE[/b][/color]
The issues that people reported are now fixed! It\'s craftable through the skyforge, and tempered through other forges.... And ofcourse, under the [b]steel[/b] section.

[b]Description[/b]
===================
The Dragon Sword is a standalone weapon that was originally created for oblivion as the \"Wolf\".
I (KevSer) asked for permission to port it and decided to make it my own... 
I came up with the name \"Dragon Sword\", and started porting, and it wasn\'t easy considering it was my first time,
Thanks to Skyedit i managed to make it standalone with some nifty features!

[b]Features[/b]
===================
[list]
[*]Stand Alone
[*]HD Textures
[*]Craftable through the Steel section at the skyforge
[*]Tempered through a forge
[*]Changes apperance when tempered
[/list]

[b]What need to be added[/b]
========================
[list]
[*]Blood Splatter
[*]Claymore?
[/list]

[b]Permissions[/b]
===================
You may not use this without written permission from me or Suhoi...

[b]Credits[/b]
===================
Models and Textures - Suhoi
Textures and game implementation - KevSer


[b]Enjoy![/b]
author: Suhoi And Kevser
